name: crm-dashboard-overview
description: CRM overview dashboard with KPI cards, pipeline summary, recent activities, and revenue chart
postMessage:
Dashboard available at /dashboard

Install deps: npm install recharts lucide-react
Install shadcn: npx shadcn@latest add card badge

Customize the data fetching functions (getKPIs, getPipeline, getActivities, getRevenueData) in page.tsx to connect to your CRM data source.
